input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: We all love Crescent products for their quality. Now try their latest product! Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is chrome and nickel plated for longer life. The industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished. The screwdriver comes with one each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted,1/4- and 5/16-inch nut driver.
input_text.Response B: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver has chrome/nickel plating for longer life and industrial tool steel bits that are heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, and blast finished for top quality. This Crescent product is a versatile screwdriver that includes one each of interchangeable bits for #1 and #2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver.
